name: Zoroark

passive.name: Illusion
passive.effect: Once per turn, you may place an Evolution card on Zoroark. This doesn't count as evolving Zoroark. Treat Zoroark as if it were that Pokemon instead. It cannot evolve or use the Pokemon Power of that Pokemon. This effect ends if any Special Condition affects Zoroark, or by choice at any time during your turn.

attacks.name: Sneak Off
attacks.effect: You may switch Zoroark with a Pokemon from your Bench.

flavor: These Pokemon look strong, but their real strength is in imitating other Pokemon to trick their opponents.
